blocks.name: sh0le
blocks.content: The zero subspace is the smallest subspace. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ch0le
blocks.content: The zero subspace is the smallest member of ` CH ` . (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2002.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shle0
blocks.content: No subspace is smaller than the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: chle0
blocks.content: No Hilbert lattice element is smaller than zero. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2002.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: chnlen0
blocks.content: A Hilbert lattice element that is not a subset of another is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ch0pss
blocks.content: The zero subspace is a proper subset of nonzero Hilbert lattice elements. (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: orthin
blocks.content: The intersection of orthogonal subspaces is the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm orthin(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wi(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)))
} = {
  syl6ibr(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wss(c0h, cin(c0, c1))))
  jctird(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wss(c0h, cin(c0, c1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wi(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0h)))
  syl5ib(wcel(c1, csh), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, cfv(cort, c1))))
  syl6sseq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, cfv(cort, c1)), cin(cfv(cort, c1), c1), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))
  ssrin(c0, cfv(cort, c1), c1)
  incom(cfv(cort, c1), c1)
  sseq2d(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, cfv(cort, c1)), c0h, wcel(c1, csh))
  ocin(c1)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wss(c0h, cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cin(c0, c1), csh))
  shincl(c0, c1)
  sh0le(cin(c0, c1))
  eqss(cin(c0, c1), c0h)
}

blocks.name: ssjo
blocks.content: The lattice join of a subset with its orthocomplement is the whole space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssjo(class c0) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, chba), wceq(co(c0, chj, cfv(cort, c0)), chba))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, chj, cfv(cort, c0)), chba, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))), wss(c0, chba))
  mpdan(wss(c0, chba), wceq(co(c0, chj, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))))), wss(cfv(cort, c0), chba))
  sshjval(c0, cfv(cort, c0))
  syl6eq(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))), chba, cfv(cort, c0h), wss(c0, chba))
  fveq2d(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), c0h, wss(c0, chba))
  eqssd(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), c0h, wss(c0, chba))
  sseqtrd(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), c0h, cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0))), wss(c0, chba))
  ssind(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), wss(c0, chba))
  mpi(wss(c0, chba), wss(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), cfv(cort, c0)), wss(c0, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))))
  ssun1(c0, cfv(cort, c0))
  mpdan(wss(c0, chba), wi(wss(c0, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), wss(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), cfv(cort, c0))), wss(cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), chba))
  occon(c0, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))
  mpi(wss(c0, chba), wss(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0))), wss(cfv(cort, c0), cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))))
  ssun2(cfv(cort, c0), c0)
  syl2anc(wss(c0, chba), wi(wss(cfv(cort, c0), cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), wss(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)))), wss(cfv(cort, c0), chba), wss(cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), chba))
  occon(cfv(cort, c0), cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))
  syl(wss(c0, chba), wceq(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0))), c0h), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh))
  ocsh(c0)
  ocin(cfv(cort, c0))
  3syl(wss(c0, chba), wss(c0h, cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))), wss(cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), chba), wcel(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), csh))
  sylib(wss(c0, chba), wss(cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), chba), wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(cfv(cort, c0), chba)))
  ancli(wss(c0, chba), wss(cfv(cort, c0), chba))
  ocss(c0)
  unss(c0, chba, cfv(cort, c0))
  ocsh(cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))
  sh0le(cfv(cort, cun(c0, cfv(cort, c0))))
  choc0()
}

blocks.name: shne0i
blocks.content: A nonzero subspace has a nonzero vector. (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shne0i(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c0v)))
  -| wcel(c0, csh)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3bitri(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c0v)), wn(wceq(c0, c0h)), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0h))))
  df-ne(c0, c0h)
  3bitr2ri(wn(wceq(c0, c0h)), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0h))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0h)))), wn(wss(c0, c0h)))
  df-rex(s0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0h)))
  nss(s0, c0, c0h)
  notbii(wss(c0, c0h), wceq(c0, c0h))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(c0, c0h), wceq(c0, c0h)), wcel(c0, csh))
  shle0(c0)
  rexbii(s0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0h)), wne(cv(s0), c0v))
  necon3bbii(cv(s0), c0v, wcel(cv(s0), c0h))
  elch0(cv(s0))
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shne0i(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ 0H ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ 0h))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ SH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  3bitri(c0 ≠ 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ 0h), ¬ c0 = 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ s0 ∈ 0H))
  df-ne(c0, c0h)
  3bitr2ri(¬ c0 = 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ s0 ∈ 0H), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ 0H)), ¬ c0 ⊆ 0H)
  df-rex(s0, c0, ¬ s0 ∈ 0H)
  nss(s0, c0, c0h)
  notbii(c0 ⊆ 0H, c0 = 0H)
  ax-mp((c0 ⊆ 0H ↔ c0 = 0H), c0 ∈ SH)
  shle0(c0)
  rexbii(s0, c0, ¬ s0 ∈ 0H, s0 ≠ 0h)
  necon3bbii(s0, c0v, s0 ∈ 0H)
  elch0(s0)
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: shs0i
blocks.content: Hilbert subspace sum with the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shs0i(class c0) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, cph, c0h), c0)
  -| wcel(c0, csh)
} = {
  3eqtri(co(c0, cph, c0h), c0, cfv(cspn, cun(c0, c0h)), cfv(cspn, c0))
  shsval3i(c0, c0h)
  h0elsh()
  fveq2i(cspn, cun(c0, c0h), c0)
  mpbi(wceq(cun(c0, c0h), c0), wss(c0h, c0))
  ax-mp(wss(c0h, c0), wcel(c0, csh))
  sh0le(c0)
  ssequn2(c0h, c0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cspn, c0), c0), wcel(c0, csh))
  spanid(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shs0i(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0[+H]0H)= c0
  ⊣ c0 ∈ SH
} = {
  3eqtri((c0[+H]0H), c0, (span `(c0 ⋃ 0H)), (span ` c0))
  shsval3i(c0, c0h)
  h0elsh()
  fveq2i(cspn, (c0 ⋃ 0H), c0)
  mpbi((c0 ⋃ 0H)= c0, 0H ⊆ c0)
  ax-mp(0H ⊆ c0, c0 ∈ SH)
  sh0le(c0)
  ssequn2(c0h, c0)
  ax-mp((span ` c0)= c0, c0 ∈ SH)
  spanid(c0)
}

blocks.name: shs00i
blocks.content: Two subspaces are zero iff their join is zero. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shs00i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wa(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h)), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h))
  -| wcel(c0, csh)
  -| wcel(c1, csh)
} = {
  impbii(wa(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h)), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h, co(c0h, cph, c0h), wa(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h)))
  oveq12(c0, c0h, c1, c0h, cph)
  shs0i(c0h)
  h0elsh()
  jca(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h), wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h))
  sylib(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h), wceq(c0, c0h), wss(c0, c0h))
  mpbii(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h), wss(c0, c0h), wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1)))
  shsub1i(c0, c1)
  sseq2(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h, c0)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(c0, c0h), wceq(c0, c0h)), wcel(c0, csh))
  shle0(c0)
  sylib(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h), wceq(c1, c0h), wss(c1, c0h))
  mpbii(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h), wss(c1, c0h), wss(c1, co(c0, cph, c1)))
  shsub2i(c1, c0)
  sseq2(co(c0, cph, c1), c0h, c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(c1, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h)), wcel(c1, csh))
  shle0(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shs00i(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 = 0H ∧ c1 = 0H)↔(c0[+H]c1)= 0H)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
} = {
  impbii((c0 = 0H ∧ c1 = 0H), (c0[+H]c1)= 0H)
  syl6eq((c0[+H]c1), c0h, (0H[+H]0H), (c0 = 0H ∧ c1 = 0H))
  oveq12(c0, c0h, c1, c0h, cph)
  shs0i(c0h)
  h0elsh()
  jca((c0[+H]c1)= 0H, c0 = 0H, c1 = 0H)
  sylib((c0[+H]c1)= 0H, c0 = 0H, c0 ⊆ 0H)
  mpbii((c0[+H]c1)= 0H, c0 ⊆ 0H, c0 ⊆(c0[+H]c1))
  shsub1i(c0, c1)
  sseq2((c0[+H]c1), c0h, c0)
  ax-mp((c0 ⊆ 0H ↔ c0 = 0H), c0 ∈ SH)
  shle0(c0)
  sylib((c0[+H]c1)= 0H, c1 = 0H, c1 ⊆ 0H)
  mpbii((c0[+H]c1)= 0H, c1 ⊆ 0H, c1 ⊆(c0[+H]c1))
  shsub2i(c1, c0)
  sseq2((c0[+H]c1), c0h, c1)
  ax-mp((c1 ⊆ 0H ↔ c1 = 0H), c1 ∈ SH)
  shle0(c1)
}

blocks.name: ch0lei

blocks.name: chle0i
blocks.content: No Hilbert closed subspace is smaller than zero. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: chocini
blocks.content: Intersection of a closed subspace and its orthocomplement. Part of Proposition 1 of [Kalmbach] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: chj0i
blocks.content: Join with lattice zero in ` CH ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chj0i(class c0) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, chj, c0h), c0)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
} = {
  3eqtri(co(c0, chj, c0h), c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c0h))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)))
  chjvali(c0, c0h)
  h0elch()
  fveq2i(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c0h)), cfv(cort, c0))
  fveq2i(cort, cun(c0, c0h), c0)
  mpbi(wceq(cun(c0, c0h), c0), wss(c0h, c0))
  ch0lei(c0)
  ssequn2(c0h, c0)
  pjococi(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chj0i(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0[vH]0H)= c0
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
} = {
  3eqtri((c0[vH]0H), c0, (_|_ `(_|_ `(c0 ⋃ 0H))), (_|_ `(_|_ ` c0)))
  chjvali(c0, c0h)
  h0elch()
  fveq2i(cort, (_|_ `(c0 ⋃ 0H)), (_|_ ` c0))
  fveq2i(cort, (c0 ⋃ 0H), c0)
  mpbi((c0 ⋃ 0H)= c0, 0H ⊆ c0)
  ch0lei(c0)
  ssequn2(c0h, c0)
  pjococi(c0)
}

blocks.name: chseli
blocks.content: Membership in subspace sum. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chseli(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  shseli(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  chshii(c1)
  chshii(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chseli(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, c0 =(s0[+h]s1))))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  shseli(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  chshii(c1)
  chshii(c2)
}

blocks.name: chincli
blocks.content: Closure of Hilbert lattice intersection. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chincli(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  eqeltrri(cin(c0, c1), cch, cint(cpr(c0, c1)))
  intpr(c0, c1)
  chintcli(cpr(c0, c1))
  pm3.2i(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cch), wne(cpr(c0, c1), emptycls))
  mpbi(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cch), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  prss(c0, cch, c1)
  elexi(c1, cch)
  prnz(c0, c1)
  elexi(c0, cch)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chincli(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  eqeltrri((c0 ⋂ c1), cch, ⋂ { c0, c1 })
  intpr(c0, c1)
  chintcli({ c0, c1 })
  pm3.2i({ c0, c1 } ⊆ CH, { c0, c1 } ≠ ∅)
  mpbi({ c0, c1 } ⊆ CH, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH))
  pm3.2i(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  prss(c0, cch, c1)
  elexi(c1, cch)
  prnz(c0, c1)
  elexi(c0, cch)
}

blocks.name: chsscon3i
blocks.content: Hilbert lattice contraposition law. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chsscon3i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  impbii(wss(c0, c1), wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0)))
  mp2an(wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0))), wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba))
  chssii(c0)
  chssii(c1)
  occon(c0, c1)
  3sstr3g(c0, c1, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0)))
  mp2an(wi(wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)))), wss(cfv(cort, c1), chba), wss(cfv(cort, c0), chba))
  chssii(cfv(cort, c1))
  choccli(c1)
  chssii(cfv(cort, c0))
  choccli(c0)
  occon(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0))
  pjococi(c0)
  pjococi(c1)
}

blocks.name: chlejb1i
blocks.content: Hilbert lattice ordering in terms of join. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chlejb1i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  impbii(wss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c1))
  sylibr(wss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c1), wa(wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c1), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  jctir(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c1), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  mpan2(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c1), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  chlubii(c0, c1, c1)
  chub2i(c1, c0)
  eqss(co(c0, chj, c1), c1)
  syl5ss(c0, c1, co(c0, chj, c1), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c1))
  chub1i(c0, c1)
  eqimss(co(c0, chj, c1), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chlejb1i(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 ↔(c0[vH]c1)= c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  impbii(c0 ⊆ c1, (c0[vH]c1)= c1)
  sylibr(c0 ⊆ c1, (c0[vH]c1)= c1, ((c0[vH]c1)⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1)))
  jctir(c0 ⊆ c1, (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c1, c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  mpan2(c0 ⊆ c1, (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ c1)
  ssid(c1)
  chlubii(c0, c1, c1)
  chub2i(c1, c0)
  eqss((c0[vH]c1), c1)
  syl5ss(c0, c1, (c0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]c1)= c1)
  chub1i(c0, c1)
  eqimss((c0[vH]c1), c1)
}

blocks.name: chdmm1i
blocks.content: De Morgan's law for meet in a Hilbert lattice. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chdmm1i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  eqssi(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)))
  mpbi(wss(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), wss(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), cin(c0, c1)))
  ssini(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), c0, c1)
  mpbi(wss(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), c0), wss(cfv(cort, c0), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))))
  chub1i(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))
  chsscon1i(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)))
  mpbi(wss(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), c1), wss(cfv(cort, c1), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))))
  chub2i(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0))
  chsscon1i(c1, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)))
  chsscon1i(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), cin(c0, c1))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))
  mp2an(wss(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1))), wss(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1))), wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1))))
  mpbi(wss(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1))), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0))
  inss1(c0, c1)
  chsscon3i(cin(c0, c1), c0)
  mpbi(wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1))), wss(cin(c0, c1), c1))
  inss2(c0, c1)
  chsscon3i(cin(c0, c1), c1)
  chlubii(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), cfv(cort, c1))
  choccli(c0)
  choccli(c1)
  choccli(cin(c0, c1))
  chincli(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: chnlei
blocks.content: Equivalent expressions for "not less than" in the Hilbert lattice. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chnlei(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wpss(c1, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wpss(c1, co(c1, chj, c0)), wn(wceq(c1, co(c1, chj, c0))), wa(wss(c1, co(c1, chj, c0)), wn(wceq(c1, co(c1, chj, c0)))))
  biantrur(wn(wceq(c1, co(c1, chj, c0))), wss(c1, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  chub1i(c1, c0)
  notbii(wss(c0, c1), wceq(c1, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  3bitri(wss(c0, c1), wceq(c1, co(c1, chj, c0)), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c1), wceq(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  chlejb1i(c0, c1)
  eqcom(co(c0, chj, c1), c1)
  eqeq2i(c1, co(c0, chj, c1), co(c1, chj, c0))
  chjcomi(c0, c1)
  dfpss2(c1, co(c1, chj, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chnlei(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ c1 ⊊(c1[vH]c0))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
} = {
  3bitr4i(¬ c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊊(c1[vH]c0), ¬ c1 =(c1[vH]c0), (c1 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)∧ ¬ c1 =(c1[vH]c0)))
  biantrur(¬ c1 =(c1[vH]c0), c1 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))
  chub1i(c1, c0)
  notbii(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 =(c1[vH]c0))
  3bitri(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 =(c1[vH]c0), (c0[vH]c1)= c1, c1 =(c0[vH]c1))
  chlejb1i(c0, c1)
  eqcom((c0[vH]c1), c1)
  eqeq2i(c1, (c0[vH]c1), (c1[vH]c0))
  chjcomi(c0, c1)
  dfpss2(c1, (c1[vH]c0))
}

blocks.name: chjassi
blocks.content: Associative law for Hilbert lattice join. From definition of lattice in [Kalmbach] p. 14. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chjassi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, chj, c1), chj, c2), co(c0, chj, co(c1, chj, c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  3eqtr3i(co(co(c0, chj, c1), chj, c2), co(c0, chj, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cfv(cort, c2))), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, co(c1, chj, c2)))))
  fveq2i(cort, cin(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cfv(cort, c2)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, co(c1, chj, c2))))
  3eqtr4i(cin(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cfv(cort, c2)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, co(c1, chj, c2))), cin(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c2)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2))))
  inass(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2))
  ineq1i(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cfv(cort, c2), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)))
  chdmj1i(c0, c1)
  ineq2i(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2)))
  chdmj1i(c1, c2)
  chdmm4i(co(c0, chj, c1), c2)
  chjcli(c0, c1)
  chdmm4i(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))
  chjcli(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: chj00i
blocks.content: Two Hilbert lattice elements are zero iff their join is zero. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chj00i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wa(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h)), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  impbii(wa(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h)), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h))
  syl6eq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h, co(c0h, chj, c0h), wa(wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h)))
  oveq12(c0, c0h, c1, c0h, chj)
  chj0i(c0h)
  h0elch()
  jca(wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h), wceq(c0, c0h), wceq(c1, c0h))
  sylib(wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h), wceq(c0, c0h), wss(c0, c0h))
  mpbii(wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h), wss(c0, c0h), wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  chub1i(c0, c1)
  sseq2(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h, c0)
  chle0i(c0)
  sylib(wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h), wceq(c1, c0h), wss(c1, c0h))
  mpbii(wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h), wss(c1, c0h), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  chub2i(c1, c0)
  sseq2(co(c0, chj, c1), c0h, c1)
  chle0i(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chj00i(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 = 0H ∧ c1 = 0H)↔(c0[vH]c1)= 0H)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  impbii((c0 = 0H ∧ c1 = 0H), (c0[vH]c1)= 0H)
  syl6eq((c0[vH]c1), c0h, (0H[vH]0H), (c0 = 0H ∧ c1 = 0H))
  oveq12(c0, c0h, c1, c0h, chj)
  chj0i(c0h)
  h0elch()
  jca((c0[vH]c1)= 0H, c0 = 0H, c1 = 0H)
  sylib((c0[vH]c1)= 0H, c0 = 0H, c0 ⊆ 0H)
  mpbii((c0[vH]c1)= 0H, c0 ⊆ 0H, c0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  chub1i(c0, c1)
  sseq2((c0[vH]c1), c0h, c0)
  chle0i(c0)
  sylib((c0[vH]c1)= 0H, c1 = 0H, c1 ⊆ 0H)
  mpbii((c0[vH]c1)= 0H, c1 ⊆ 0H, c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  chub2i(c1, c0)
  sseq2((c0[vH]c1), c0h, c1)
  chle0i(c1)
}

blocks.name: shjshsi
blocks.content: Hilbert lattice join equals the double orthocomplement of subspace sum. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shjshsi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1))))
  -| wcel(c0, csh)
  -| wcel(c1, csh)
} = {
  eqssi(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1))))
  eqsstri(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1)))), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh))
  shjval(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1)))), wss(cun(c0, c1), co(c0, cph, c1)))
  shunssi(c0, c1)
  occon2i(cun(c0, c1), co(c0, cph, c1))
  unssi(c0, c1, chba)
  shssii(c0)
  shssii(c1)
  mpbi(wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1))), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1))))
  ax-mp(wss(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1))), wss(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  shsleji(c0, c1)
  mp2an(wi(wss(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1)))), wss(co(c0, cph, c1), chba), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), chba))
  chssii(co(c0, chj, c1))
  occon(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1))
  chsscon1i(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1)))
  shjcli(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cort, co(c0, cph, c1)), cch), wss(co(c0, cph, c1), chba))
  shssii(co(c0, cph, c1))
  shscli(c0, c1)
  occl(co(c0, cph, c1))
}

blocks.name: chne0
blocks.content: A nonzero closed subspace has a nonzero vector. (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chne0(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wb(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c0v))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  dedth(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch), wb(wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c0v))), wb(wne(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c0h), wrex(s0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), wne(cv(s0), c0v))))
  bibi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))), wne(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c0v)), wne(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c0h), wrex(s0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), wne(cv(s0), c0v)))
  neeq1(c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c0h)
  rexeq(s0, c0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), wne(cv(s0), c0v))
  chne0i(s0, cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch))
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cch)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chne0(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CH →(c0 ≠ 0H ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ 0h)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  dedth(c0, c0h, c0 ∈ CH, (c0 ≠ 0H ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ 0h)), (if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)≠ 0H ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), s0 ≠ 0h)))
  bibi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c0 ≠ 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ≠ 0h), if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H)≠ 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), s0 ≠ 0h))
  neeq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), c0h)
  rexeq(s0, c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H), s0 ≠ 0h)
  chne0i(s0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, 0H))
  elimel(c0, cch, c0h)
  h0elch()
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, c0h, c0 ∈ CH)
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cch)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: chssoc
blocks.content: A closed subspace less than its orthocomplement is zero. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chssoc(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wb(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(c0, c0h)))
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, cch), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(c0, c0h))
  syl5ib(wcel(c0, cch), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(c0, c0h), wss(c0, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0))))
  syl5eqssr(c0, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), cin(c0, c0), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))
  inidm(c0)
  sslin(c0, cfv(cort, c0), c0)
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cch), wss(c0, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), wceq(c0, c0h), wss(c0, c0h))
  sseq2d(c0, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h, wcel(c0, cch))
  chocin(c0)
  chle0(c0)
  ex(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(c0, c0h), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))
  eqsstrd(c0, cfv(cort, c0), c0h, wa(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(c0, c0h)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(c0, c0h))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(c0, c0h), wss(c0h, cfv(cort, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cch), wss(c0h, cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch))
  choccl(c0)
  ch0le(cfv(cort, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chssoc(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CH →(c0 ⊆(_|_ ` c0)↔ c0 = 0H))
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈ CH, c0 ⊆(_|_ ` c0), c0 = 0H)
  syl5ib(c0 ∈ CH, c0 ⊆(_|_ ` c0), c0 = 0H, c0 ⊆(c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c0)))
  syl5eqssr(c0, (c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c0)), (c0 ⋂ c0), c0 ⊆(_|_ ` c0))

thm ledii(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| wcel(c2, cch)

  mp2an(wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), c0), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wss(cin(c0, c2), c0))
